outputs.output_descr:
To strengthen the Capacity of the Covernment to coordinate, Monitor and Evaluate the CP there is a need to develop the capacity of partners and UNDP CO staff. This component will provide advisory service to the Government and UNDP Senior Management on CPAP Coordination, RMB and M&E, to achieve the following Project Outputs:
	Project Output 1: Technical capacity of implementing partners (IP's) and UNDP country office staff strengthened on the RBM/PME (planning, monitoring and evaluation). 
	Project Output 1: Institutional capacities of MINEC and UNDP maintained in support for the effective delivery of the country programme. 
	Project Output 3: The country programme monitored and evaluated according to their efficiency/effectiveness, relevance and sustainability.
	Project Output 4: The coordination capacity of MINEC enhanced for the implementation of the country programme.
	Project Output 5: Annual NIM/NGO audit exercise completed on time.
